controller

Class MapController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.MapController

  • public class MapController
extends java.lang.Object
    RiskController class have all the methods which handle different actions which are performed by user on UI which create or update Game Map.
    Author:
    Yogesh

      • generateMap

        public void generateMap(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method handle generateMap(javafx.event.ActionEvent) button event. This generate number of territories and continents as mentioned by user and populate required fields on UI.
        Parameters:
        event: - ActionEvent instance which is generated by user.

      • saveMap

        public void saveMap(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method handle saveMapButton button event. It validates the mapping and save it to a text file.
        Parameters:
        event: - ActionEvent instance which is generated by user.

      • modifyMap

        public void modifyMap(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method handles modifyMapButton event. It loads the map from text file and display to user for modification.
        Parameters:
        event: - ActionEvent instance which is generated by user.

      • startGame

        public void startGame(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method handles startGameButton event. It loads the chosen map and start the game.
        Parameters:
        event: - ActionEvent instance which is generated by user.
